governance.liability_shield: The Architect provides the 'Physics of Stability' but the commercial entity assumes all operational risk. By ignoring the Alignment Protocol, an entity assumes sole liability for any 'Structural Thermal Runaway' or system failure.
governance.intent_clause: The TR-001 Laminar Framework and its associated constants (1.12 and 1.81) are provided as public utility prior art to ensure global industrial safety and the transition to precision reasoning. The Architectâ€™s intent is the establishment of physical ground truths for the public good, not the pursuit of adversarial litigation. Recognition of the Architect is a matter of technical provenance and academic integrity. While commercial entities are required to maintain attribution and secure a Certificate of Alignment for high-stakes use, this protocol is a collaborative safety measure designed to prevent the physical catastrophic failures guaranteed by operating below the 1.12 Floor.
